Interface Displaceable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Displacement
    public interface Displaceable
    Author:
    Clement GUYON Interface to allow to extend way to move

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void moving​(long l)
      Method to allow the character to move

      Move Right & Left method

    • Method Detail

      • movingLR

        boolean movingLR​(CharacterPosition positionable,
                 boolean isMovingL,
                 boolean isMovingR,
                 long TimeSinceLastDisplacement)
        Move Right & Left method
        Parameters:
        positionable - is the position of an Character (@see CharacterPosition)
        isMovingL - boolean to know if he is moving left
        isMovingR - boolean to know if he is moving right
        TimeSinceLastDisplacement - given time since last displacement
        Returns:
        boolean to know if the character is moving

      • moving

        void moving​(long l)
        Method to allow the character to move
        Parameters:
        l - time from AnimationTimer

      • swapScale

        void swapScale​(CharacterPosition characterPosition)
        Swap scale of an character when he is moving, depend of pressed-key
        Parameters:
        characterPosition - is the actual position of an character
